description:
BUSINESS MODELLING is inevitable when building a business. It helps you strengthen your understanding of your idea, and helps get your idea clearly and concisely to others (Potential Co-founders, investors etc.).

I was confronted with this exact problem, and couldn't find an appropriate guide that would walk me through it, also making me understand the different kinds of models that exist. So, I did my research, and have made several great plans since then!

This course will help you build a solid foundation of the various aspects of a Business Model and save you from the trouble I had to go through!

Here are the things you can expect to learn from this course:

  • The exact meaning of a Business Model.
  • Differences between a Business Model and a Business Plan.
  • Why do you need one?
  • The various essential components in detail.
  • How to make your own Model?
  • About 45 different kinds of REVENUE MODELS!

Also, I will continually update the course to add new and exciting elements that would push the 'GREATNESS' of your Business Model even further!

Hope you invest 45 minutes of your time to heighten your chances of success as an entrepreneur!
title: The Complete Business Modelling Course (With 45 Examples!)
